text: Hagi Ra Anumzamofo eri'zama eneriza pristi vahe'mo'za, ra mono nomofo avugane, kresramana vu itama me'nea kankamumpi mani'neza amanage hu'za zamasunkura hu'za zavi krafage hiho. Ra Anumzamoka vaheka'a zamagu nevazinka, atrege'za kiza zokago kea huozmanteho. Zamatrege'za megi'a vahe'mo'za huhavizana hunezmante'za kiza zokago kea hu'za iga mono'ma hunentaza Anumzana mani'ne hu'za osiho.
